contents.name: manufacturer
contents.description: Company name of the device manufacturer. This could be the same as the name of the original equipment manufacturer (OEM).

contents.name: processorArchitecture
contents.description: Architecture of the processor on the device.

contents.name: totalStorage
contents.description: Total available storage on the device in kilobytes.

contents.name: totalMemory
contents.description: Total available memory on the device in kilobytes.
